001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.Formatter;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Document;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Node;
011
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.ICustomJavaDataType;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.FlexmarkFactory;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.InsertAnchorExtension.InsertAnchorNode;
015
016import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLStreamWriter2;
017import org.codehaus.stax2.evt.XMLEventFactory2;
018
019import java.io.IOException;
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.function.Predicate;
022import java.util.stream.Stream;
023
024import javax.xml.stream.XMLEventWriter;
025import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException;
026
027import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
028
029/**
030 * The common interface for all markup implementations.
031 *
032 * @param <TYPE>
033 *          the Java type of the concrete markup implementation
034 */
035public interface IMarkupString<TYPE extends IMarkupString<TYPE>>
036    extends ICustomJavaDataType<TYPE> {
037  /**
038   * Get the underlying Flexmark factory supporting markup serialization.
039   *
040   * @return the factory
041   */
042  @NonNull
043  FlexmarkFactory getFlexmarkFactory();
044
045  /**
046   * Get the top-level Flexmark document node for the markup.
047   *
048   * @return the node
049   */
050  @NonNull
051  Document getDocument();
052
053  /**
054   * Determine if the markup has no contents.
055   *
056   * @return {@code true} if the markup has no contents or {@code false} otherwise
057   */
058  boolean isEmpty();
059
060  /**
061   * Get the HyperText Markup Language (HTML) representation of this markup
062   * string.
063   *
064   * @return the HTML
065   */
066  @NonNull
067  String toHtml();
068
069  /**
070   * Get the Extensible HyperText Markup Language (XHTML) representation of this
071   * markup string.
072   *
073   * @param namespace
074   *          the XML namespace to use for XHTML elements
075   *
076   * @return the XHTML
077   * @throws XMLStreamException
078   *           if an error occurred while establishing or writing to the
079   *           underlying XML stream
080   * @throws IOException
081   *           if an error occurred while generating the XHTML data
082   */
083  @NonNull
084  String toXHtml(@NonNull String namespace) throws XMLStreamException, IOException;
085
086  /**
087   * Get the Commonmark Markdown representation of this markup string.
088   *
089   * @return the Markdown
090   */
091  @NonNull
092  String toMarkdown();
093
094  /**
095   * Get a Markdown representation of this markup string, which will be created by
096   * the provided formatter.
097   *
098   * @param formatter
099   *          the specific Markdown formatter to use in producing the Markdown
100   *
101   * @return the Markdown
102   */
103  @NonNull
104  String toMarkdown(@NonNull Formatter formatter);
105
106  /**
107   * Converts the markup content to plain text.
108   *
109   * @return the plain text representation of the markup content
110   */
111  @NonNull
112  String toText();
113
114  /**
115   * Retrieve all nodes contained within this markup text as a stream.
116   *
117   * @return a depth first stream
118   */
119  @NonNull
120  Stream<Node> getNodesAsStream();
121
122  /**
123   * Get markup inserts used as place holders within the string.
124   *
125   * @return a list of insets or an empty list if no inserts are present
126   */
127  @NonNull
128  default List<InsertAnchorNode> getInserts() {
129    return getInserts(insert -> true);
130  }
131
132  /**
133   * Retrieve all insert statements that are contained within this markup text
134   * that match the provided filter.
135   *
136   * @param filter
137   *          a filter used to identify matching insert statements
138   * @return the matching insert statements
139   */
140  @NonNull
141  List<InsertAnchorNode> getInserts(
142      @NonNull Predicate<InsertAnchorNode> filter);
143
144  /**
145   * Determine if the Markup consists of block elements.
146   *
147   * @return {@code true} if the markup consists of block elements, or
148   *         {@code false} otherwise
149   */
150  boolean isBlock();
151
152  /**
153   * Write the Extensible HyperText Markup Language (XHTML) representation of this
154   * markup string to the provided stream writer.
155   *
156   * @param namespace
157   *          the XML namespace to use for XHTML elements
158   * @param streamWriter
159   *          the XML stream to write to
160   * @throws XMLStreamException
161   *           if an error occurred while establishing or writing to the XML
162   *           stream
163   */
164  void writeXHtml(
165      @NonNull String namespace,
166      @NonNull XMLStreamWriter2 streamWriter) throws XMLStreamException;
167
168  /**
169   * Write the Extensible HyperText Markup Language (XHTML) representation of this
170   * markup string to the provided stream writer using the provided XML event
171   * factory.
172   *
173   * @param namespace
174   *          the XML namespace to use for XHTML elements
175   * @param eventFactory
176   *          the XML event factory used to generate XML events to write
177   * @param eventWriter
178   *          the XML event stream to write to
179   * @throws XMLStreamException
180   *           if an error occurred while establishing or writing to the XML
181   *           stream
182   */
183  void writeXHtml(
184      @NonNull String namespace,
185      @NonNull XMLEventFactory2 eventFactory,
186      @NonNull XMLEventWriter eventWriter) throws XMLStreamException;
187}
